meanings.definition: The quality or state of being pure.
meanings.sent1: The purenesses of her heart shone through in her kind actions.
meanings.sent2: The purenesses of the water in the mountain stream made it safe to drink.
meanings.sent3: The purenesses of the freshly baked cookies made them irresistible to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The purenesses of a child's laughter can brighten even the darkest days.
meanings.sent5: The purenesses of a snow-covered landscape brought a sense of peace to the weary traveler.

meanings.definition: The condition of being free from contamination or impurities.
meanings.sent1: The purenesses of the air in the forest made it refreshing to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The purenesses of the gold made it highly valuable in the market.
meanings.sent3: The purenesses of the exam room made it a suitable environment for the students.
meanings.sent4: The purenesses of her intentions were evident in her sincere apology.
meanings.sent5: The purenesses of a clear conscience can bring inner peace and contentment.
